name: STAR.BIT
description:
A hyper endless runner, with a 360 twist! Simple to play but hard to master, how far do you think you can make it?

Controls:

Left arrow and Right arrow - switch directions

OR

Left mouse click and Right mouse click - switch directions

C for credits

Special thanks to JaxDrumm who provided me with the awesome 9 track playlist for this game! Go check out his work: http://soundcloud.com/jackson-drummond!

Please contribute as much as you can! Your donations contribute towards my well-being and also towards a Google Play licence so I can port this game on the market!

Android APK release will be released very soon!
